description.value:
Element earth; Type form infusion; Level 5; Burn 3
Associated Blasts earth
Saving Throw none

You send a tremor through the ground or other solid surface with which you are in contact, allowing you to affect a burrowing or incorporeal creature within that same surface with a normal kinetic blast.

This infusion doesnâ€™t allow you to attack creatures above the ground if you are burrowing or to ignore total cover provided by factors other than burrowing.
